net.minecraft.src.modoptionsapi
Class ModOptions

java.lang.Object
  net.minecraft.src.modoptionsapi.ModOptions

public class ModOptions
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract representation of a set of options for a single mod

Since:
0.1
